mita nidasunak lesa ‘welendapolak nathi nisa samajawadaya akaryakshamaya’ yana wiwechanayata pilithuru demin aarthikaya sambandha sowiyat sangamaye thibu modalayata amatharawa lokaye samajawadi adahas darannan athara wikalpa samajawadi aarthika modala pilibandawa pawathina wiwadaya handunwadimata eegaltan uthsaha karayi.

ee atharin kihipayak lesa galla bataduwa sugatharamaya, galla maitipe sudarshanaramaya, galla walawwaththa gunarathana mudalindaramaya, manawila kheththaramaya, mathara polhena purwaramaya dakwimata puluwana.pudgala aadhyathmayehi sanwardhanayak athi kirimata ha pradeshaye du daruwan wetha dharma gnyanaya beda dimata mulikawa katayuthu kala kachchiwaththa wiharasthanaya mulika wi 1894 warshaye di galle mulma piriwena lesa gunarathana mudalindarama piriwena aarambha karana ladi.

che. aar. jayawardhana mathithuma palana kalayata wada dahas gunayaka aparadha aar premadasa palana samayedi athi wuna. 1977 n passe marana daduwama sara wadiyi kiyala hiren eliyata gaththa minimaruwanta samadana winishchayakara padawi pawa laba dila punaruththapanaya karala samaja gatha kala. 1994 chandrika kumarathunga mahathmiyage palana kalaya arambaimath samaga rate aparadha pramanaya aduwuna.

kshanika paniwida yawimata, anathuru angawimak kirimata, hadisi aapada thathwa danum dimata, wenath wichithrawath awastha pilibanda danum dimata, jathika uthsawa pilibanda danum dimata me me wargaye aplikeshan bhawitha karanna puluwan.

haya hathara nodath daru patawun siya gananak mema rasakaraka nisa pilika rogin wanawita boho samagam wishala washayen labha upayana bawa prasiddha rahasaki.kese wethath atham sanwardhitha ratawal thama anagatha daru parapura surakshitha karalannata wasa wisha sahitha aahara aanayanaya thahanam kara thibe.eheth apa wani sanwardhanaya wemin pawathna ratawal wetha mewani ugra wisha rasayana sahitha aahara aanayanaya digin digatama sidu we.menisa daruwan kuda wiye patan sosejas,kshanika nudls,sup kata,panibima warga aadiyehi goduru bawata path we.awasanawantha ma karuna wanne apeksha rohale pilika rogayen pida widina daruwangen boho dena ruduru maraya samaga satan karamin widinnata thibena kuda wiyehi sundarathwaya wenuwata maraya samaga widawamin kal yawimayi.

mema samaru wadasatahane pradhana deshanaya antharjalaya osse peratugami samajawadi pakshaye madhyama karaka sabhika sujith kuruwita sahodaraya wisin pawathwanu labu athara piditha janaya wenuwen jiwitha parithyaga kala ee sama minisekuma warthamanaye apa hadawath thula amaraniya minisun lesata sadakalikawa jiwathwana bawa kiya sitiyeya.

handunumpath karyalaya asaladi mama eebrahim (jordanaya ) , thasfaya mabrathu (ithiyopiyawa ) , josaf ayiwaru (ghana) , gaspa (ikwadoraya) amira (sudanaya) , aar.pi sin (indiyawa ) , sayid mushthaba (iranaya) , samek sahid (eejipthuwa) ,rashida (morokkowa) sarlashd (afganisthanaya ) , mohomad kaba (giniyawa ) meri (tanseniyawa ) , jastina (nayijiriyawa) , mariya (angolawa) , franklin (mosambik) rasu amira (madagaskaraya) , morad (tiyunisiyawa) , halid shawkath (banladeshaya ) yana sisu sisuwiyan handuna gaththemi.
